axis_supply.supply_status: CRITICAL - Axis surrender 13 May 1943. Final two weeks: fuel exhausted, ammunition rationed to defensive fires only, food reduced to emergency rations, water scarce, medical supplies depleted. Supply system collapsed - no resupply after May 8.

allied_supply.supply_status: NOT APPLICABLE - Division not in North Africa theater during 1943q2 (April-June 1943). Division located in Palestine/Syria undergoing rest, refit, reorganization, and training. 7th Armoured Brigade joined division 3 June 1943. Tunisia Campaign concluded 13 May 1943 - division did not participate.
